summary: Load a machine learning model by ID
description:
Loads a machine learning model that is managed by the current back-end, identified by a back-end specific model identifier.

This allows the back-end to host and optimize models for efficient inference and training (e.g., via model-specific libraries such as Terratorch). Back-end specific models can be referenced by a string identifier similar to collections.

If you want to load a model from a STAC Item implementing the `mlm` extension, use `load_stac_ml()` instead.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The back-end specific identifier of the machine learning model to load.

returns.description: A machine learning model to be used with machine learning processes such as `ml_predict()`.
